title: Remove Calls feature from frontend and rename app to MessageCenter

requirements.summary: Remove the entire call feature from the frontend UI, routing, hooks, and navigation.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/pages/CallsPage.tsx is removed or no longer referenced anywhere in the app build.
frontend/src/App.tsx no longer imports CallsPage and no longer defines a /calls route.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppShell.tsx bottom navigation no longer shows a “Calls” tab and does not navigate to /calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts no longer exports useGetCallHistory, useInitiateCall, or useUpdateCallStatus, and there are no remaining call-related imports (Call, CallStatus).
The frontend builds and runs without referencing call features.

file_operations.description: Remove the Calls page implementation so it cannot be built or navigated to.
Remove CallsPage import and remove the /calls route from the TanStack Router route tree to ensure no calls route exists.
Remove the Calls bottom navigation item and its Phone icon import so the UI has no navigation entry to /calls.
Remove all call-related React Query hooks (useGetCallHistory/useInitiateCall/useUpdateCallStatus) and remove call-related type imports (Call, CallStatus) so the data layer no longer references calls.

requirements.summary: Rename user-facing app branding to “MessageCenter” (header and browser tab title).
acceptanceCriteria: The top-bar app name displayed in the UI is “MessageCenter” (replacing the current “Connect”).
No remaining user-facing strings refer to the old app name(s) (e.g., “Connect”, “TalkingPalace”) in primary branding locations.

file_operations.description: Update the top-bar app name text from “Connect” to “MessageCenter” to reflect the new branding consistently.
Update the HTML document <title> to “MessageCenter” so the browser tab title matches the new app name.
